title: Shrewsbury fan arrested for Hillsborough chants
shortDescription: Merseyside Police have confirmed a man was arrested for 'abusive chants' about the Hillsborough disaster before Shrewsbury's FA Cup tie at Liverpool.

title: The seven-day shake-up: Relegation picture analysed
shortDescription: Watford play Newcastle, Burnley and Norwich in the next seven days as the battle at the bottom intensifies. We evaluate the state of play in the fight for survival...

shortDescription: All the latest Newcastle transfer news, rumours and gossip, as new manager Eddie Howe looks to improve his squad in the January transfer window...

title: Houghton signs Man City contract extension
shortDescription: Manchester City captain Steph Houghton has signed a contract extension.

title: AFCON: Who made the team of the round?
shortDescription: Who impressed during the first round of matches at the 2021 Africa Cup of Nations? WhoScored.com pick their team of the round...

title: Why Villa have moved for Digne
shortDescription: Aston Villa have completed a £25m deal to sign Everton left-back Lucas Digne - but what will the France international bring to Steven Gerrard's squad?

title: Digne joins Villa for £25m: 'I came here for the manager'
shortDescription: Aston Villa have signed Everton left-back Lucas Digne in a deal worth up to £25m.

shortDescription: Newcastle have completed the £25m signing of Burnley striker Chris Wood.

title: 'Caged lion' Sanchez wins Inter Italian Super Cup
shortDescription: Alexis Sanchez's last-gasp goal in extra-time won the Italian Super Cup for Inter Milan, snatching a 2-1 victory over rivals Juventus.

title: Moyes tips Bowen for England call-up as West Ham beat Norwich
shortDescription: West Ham moved back into the Champions League places after sweeping aside rock-bottom Norwich 2-0 at the London Stadium in the Premier League on Wednesday.

title: Ronaldo: I'm not at Man Utd to compete for sixth or seventh
shortDescription: Cristiano Ronaldo says it is not acceptable for Man Utd to be aiming for anything less than a top-three Premier League finish this season.

shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Thursday's national newspapers...

title: Rudiger: I have enjoyed this Chelsea chapter | Redknapp: Sign him up!
shortDescription: Chelsea's soon-to-be out-of-contract Antonio Rudiger said he has enjoyed this chapter of his career while Jamie Redknapp has urged the club to sign him up.

title: Chelsea ease past Spurs into Carabao Cup final
shortDescription: Chelsea booked their spot in the Carabao Cup final as they eased past Tottenham 3-0 on aggregate.

title: Hemp scores twice as Man City thrash Leicester to reach QFs
shortDescription: Manchester City booked their place in the Continental Cup knockouts with a 5-0 thrashing of Leicester City.

title: Ronaldo: Rangnick will do a good job at Man Utd
shortDescription: Cristiano Ronaldo says he expects Ralf Rangnick to do a good job at Manchester United but needs to be given time to turn things around.

title: Real reach Super Cup final with Saudi Clasico win
shortDescription: Real Madrid booked their ticket to the Spanish Super Cup final in Saudi Arabia courtesy of a 3-2 extra-time win over Barcelona - their fifth straight El Clasico victory.
